properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , ADMIN_STATUS FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 1 AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_DIVISION = 1 AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_DIVISION = 1 AND USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 2 AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 2 AND MT_GRADE = 1 AND (MT_GRANT = 'A' OR MT_GRANT = 'W') AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 2 AND MT_GRADE = 2 AND MT_GRANT = 'A' AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE ((USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_DIVISION = 2) OR MT_GRANT = 'D') AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION IS NOT NULL AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_DIVISION IS NOT NULL AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN USERINFO U ON(I.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) WHERE (I.USER_NO = ? OR I.CP_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND CP_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN USERINFO U ON(I.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) WHERE (I.USER_NO = ? OR I.CP_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND CP_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE (P.USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND REFUND = 'W'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 1 AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_DIVISION = 1 AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_DIVISION = 1 AND USER_STATUS= 'Y' AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_DIVISION = 2 AND USER_STATUS= 'N' AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 2 AND MT_GRADE = 1 AND (MT_GRANT = 'A' OR MT_GRANT = 'W') AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 2 AND MT_GRADE = 2 AND MT_GRANT = 'A' AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO JOIN MENTOR USING(USER_NO) WHERE ((USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_DIVISION = 2) OR MT_GRANT = 'D') AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE USERINFO SET USER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USERINFO SET USER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT USER_NO , CLCG_NO , MT_COMPANY , MT_JOB , MT_GRADE , MT_GRANT , MT_ENROLLDATE , EMPCARD_PATH , EMPCARD_ORIGINNAME , IDCARD_PATH , IDCARD_ORIGINNAME FROM MENTOR WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE MENTOR SET CLCG_NO = ? , MT_GRADE = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USERINFO SET USER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE MENTOR M SET MT_GRANT = 'A' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USERINFO SET USER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION IS NOT NULL AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_DIVISION IS NOT NULL AND (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , CL_TITLE , CP_NAME , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE FROM PAY P JOIN CLASS USING(CL_NO) FULL JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON USING(ISUCP_NO) FULL JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PAY_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , CL_TITLE , CP_NAME , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON USING(ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ? ORDER BY PAY_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , P.CL_NO , CL_TITLE , P.ISUCP_NO , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN CLASS CL ON(P.CL_NO=CL.CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON I ON(P.ISUCP_NO = I.ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE (P.USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND REFUND = 'W' ORDER BY PAY_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U USING(USER_NO) WHERE (USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND REFUND = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , CL_TITLE , CP_NAME , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON USING(ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE (P.USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND REFUND = 'Y' ORDER BY REFUND_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U USING(USER_NO) WHERE (USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND (REFUND = 'Y' OR REFUND = 'D')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , CL_TITLE , CP_NAME , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON USING(ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE (P.USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND (REFUND = 'Y' OR REFUND = 'D') ORDER BY REFUND_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U USING(USER_NO) WHERE (USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND (REFUND = 'D')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO", A.* FROM (SELECT PAY_NO , P.USER_NO , CL_TITLE , CP_NAME , PAYMENT , REFUND , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE , REFUND_DATE , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM PAY P JOIN USERINFO U ON(P.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN CLASS USING(CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON USING(ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C USING(CP_NO) WHERE (P.USER_NO = ? OR PAY_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND (REFUND = 'D') ORDER BY REFUND_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM COUPON ORDER BY CP_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LISTCOUNT" FROM COUPON WHERE CP_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CP_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM (SELECT CP_NO , CP_NAME , DISCOUNT , CP_ADDDATE , CP_STATUS FROM COUPON ORDER BY CP_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM (SELECT CP_NO , CP_NAME , DISCOUNT , CP_ADDDATE , CP_STATUS FROM COUPON WHERE CP_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CP_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT C.USER_NO FROM CLASS_ING C JOIN USERINFO U ON(C.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS='N' GROUP BY C.USER_NO;
INSERT INTO COUPON VALUES (SEQ_CP.NEXTVAL,?,?,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNO",A.* FROM(SELECT CP_NO FROM COUPON ORDER BY CP_NO DESC)A) WHERE RNO = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ISUCP_NO , I.USER_NO , USER_NAME , I.CP_NO , CP_NAME , I.CP_STATUS , CP_ISSUEDATE , CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN USERINFO U ON(I.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN COUPON C ON(I.CP_NO=C.CP_NO) WHERE (I.USER_NO = ? OR I.CP_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND I.CP_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ISUCP_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ISUCP_NO , I.USER_NO , USER_NAME , I.CP_NO , CP_NAME , I.CP_STATUS , CP_ISSUEDATE , CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN USERINFO U ON(I.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) JOIN COUPON C ON(I.CP_NO=C.CP_NO) WHERE (I.USER_NO = ? OR I.CP_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND I.CP_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ISUCP_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO ISSUANCECOUPON VALUES (SEQ_ISUCP.NEXTVAL,?,?,DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
SELECT USER_NO FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS='N' AND USER_DIVISION=1 GROUP BY USER_NO
SELECT USER_NO FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS='N' AND USER_DIVISION IS NOT NULL GROUP BY USER_NO
UPDATE COUPON SET CP_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CP_NO = ?
UPDATE COUPON SET CP_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CP_NO = ?
DELETE FROM COUPON WHERE CP_NO = ?
DELETE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON WHERE ISUCP_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ISSUANCECOUPON VALUES (SEQ_ISUCP.NEXTVAL,?,?,DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
UPDATE PAY SET REFUND = 'Y' ,REFUND_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PAY_NO = ?
DELETE FROM CLASS_ING WHERE USER_NO = ? AND CL_NO = ?
UPDATE ISSUANCECOUPON SET CP_STATUS = 'N' WHERE ISUCP_NO = ?
UPDATE PAY SET REFUND = 'D' ,REFUND_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PAY_NO = ?
SELECT USER_NO,USER_ID,USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS ='N' AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT USER_NO FROM USERINFO WHERE (USER_NO = ? OR USER_NAME LIKE ?) AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO ISSUANCECOUPON (ISUCP_NO,USER_NO,CP_NO) VALUES (SEQ_ISUCP.NEXTVAL,?,?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_DIVISION = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM USERINFO U JOIN MENTOR M ON(M.USER_NO=U.USER_NO) WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND U.ADMIN_STATUS = 'N' AND U.USER_DIVISION = 2 AND M.MT_GRANT = 'A'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM USERINFO U WHERE TO_CHAR(U.ACCESSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM PAY WHERE TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM PAY WHERE REFUND = 'W'
